TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameScope

summary.span: 针对如何在特定的 XAML 名称范围内访问元素的名称，以及如何强制该 XAML 名称范围内名称的唯一性，定义一个协定。

span.span: Defines a contract for how names of elements should be accessed within a particular XAML namescope, and how to enforce uniqueness of names within that XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由具有子元素的类实现，这些子元素旨在通过模板或延迟比喻重复使用。This interface is implemented by classes that have child elements that are intended to be reused through the template or defer metaphor. 模板、工厂和类似构造必须具有唯一的 XAML 名称范围，它们独立于主对象图和根 XAML。Templates, factories and similar constructs must have unique XAML namescopes that are separate from a main object graph and root XAML. 此处的原则是，当从这些子元素创建的对象引入应用程序的对象图时，不应出现名称冲突，因此，依赖于名称标识符的 DOM 操作和 XAML 引用技术可以依赖于每个 XAML 名称范围中的名称唯一性。The principle here is that there should be no name collisions when objects created from those child elements are introduced to an application's object graph, and so that DOM operations and XAML reference techniques that rely on the name identifier can rely on name uniqueness in each XAML namescope. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，此接口存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在 .NET Framework 4 中， 位于 system.exception 程序集中。In .NET Framework 4, is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 此接口由 WPF 类实现 。This interface is implemented by the WPF class . WPF 中的大部分 XAML 名称范围操作都是通过使用实例来运行的 ，但有时会使用引用在内部进行信息通信 。Most XAML namescope operations in WPF operate by using instances, but information is occasionally communicated internally by using references. 使用工厂或延迟形式与 XAML 表示形式结合使用的 WPF 类的示例包括 和 。Examples of WPF classes that use a factory or defer metaphor combined with XAML representation are and . 这些实现通常依赖于类中提供的接口方法的显式版本 。These implementations usually rely on the explicit versions of the interface methods available from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object FindName(string name) cil managed
Public Function FindName (name As String) As Object

param.name: name
param.span: 发出请求的对象的名称标识符。

span.span: The name identifier for the object being requested.

summary.span: 返回具有提供的标识名称的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that has the provided identifying name.

returns.span: 如果找不到该名称的对象，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if no object of that name was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 标记中的有效名称字符串必须符合 [XamlName 语法](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar)中所述的要求。Valid name strings in XAML markup must match the requirements documented in [XamlName Grammar](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar).

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterName (string name, object scopedElement);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterName(string name, object scopedElement) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterName (name As String, scopedElement As Object)
public: void RegisterName(System::String ^ name, System::Object ^ scopedElement);
abstract member RegisterName : string * obj -> unit

param.name: scopedElement
param.span: 提供的 所引用的特定元素。

span.span: The specific element that the provided refers to.

summary.span: 将提供的名称注册到当前的 XAML 名称范围中。

span.span: Registers the provided name into the current XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 名称范围中不允许有重复的名称。Duplicate names in a XAML namescope are not permitted.

para.span: 不允许注册重复的名称。

span.span: Do not permit duplicate names to be registered.

para.span: 如果已将输入 分配到 XAML 名称范围的内部集合表示形式中的现有元素 (即使它与) 相同，也会 引发异常。

span.span: If the input is already assigned to an existing element in the internal collection representation of the XAML namescope (even if it is the same as ), throw an exception.

para.span: 如果提供的名称不符合 [XamlName 语法](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar)，还应考虑引发异常。

span.span: Also consider throwing an exception if the provided name does not conform to [XamlName Grammar](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UnregisterName(string name) cil managed

summary.span: 从当前的 XAML 名称范围中注销提供的名称。

span.span: Unregisters the provided name from the current XAML namescope.

para.span: 如果输入名称不存在，则引发异常。

span.span: If the input name does not exist, throw an exception.

para.span: 你应从 XAML 名称范围的集合表示形式中删除该名称和以前注册的元素，以便在将来可能再次注册相同的名称。

span.span: You should remove the name and the previously registered element it refers to from the collection representation of the XAML namescope, so that the same name could potentially be registered again in the future.
